alert.note: Alert for Concho; Irion; Menard; Schleicher; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 9:25PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Schleicher, Tom Green, Menard, Concho and northeastern Irion Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 923 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from northern Tom Green County southeast into southern Menard County, all moving north at 30 mph. In addition to the gusty winds and small hail, very heavy rainfall was occurring with all of this activity. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Angelo, Menard, Paint Rock, Christoval, Eden, Lowake, Wall, Saline, Grape Creek, Goodfellow Air Force Base, Veribest, Knickerbocker, Vancourt, Lake Nasworthy, Tankersley, Eola, Orient, San Angelo State Park, Twin Buttes Reservoir and Water Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.

area.areaDesc: Concho; Irion; Menard; Schleicher; Tom Green
